name: Concession Obsession
description:
DISCLAIMER: DOWNLOADING IS RECOMMENDED DUE TO RESOLUTION ISSUES. I have absolutely no clue how to accurately scale the game in Itch.io, so it'll start in fullscreen. Press F11 for the best effect!

Join Unnamed Fat Man on his journey through the concession stand filled streets in "Concession Obsession". Don't let the temptation get to him to purchase unhealthy goods and instead collect water bottles to hold off the food-induced urges.

This is my first game jam game, which I made in about a day after forgetting I entered. After slaving away deep into the night [2 AM ( ͡° ͜ʖ ͡°) ] I succeeded in creating this masterpiece, feedback would be appreciated even though most of the issues I'm probably aware of, and finally thank you for reading my lengthy description.
